Name: Sarona
description:
Sarona is a 29-year-old single woman with no children. She makes and sells pancakes in her community to earn a living and has 2 years of experience with this business.

Currently, Sarona needs a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, a large frying pan, a new oven, cooking oil, a strainer, and yeast. She plans to use her profits to extend her business and support her family financially. She has been a member of SPBD since 2018.
